Script for Teen

Dialog 3 – dTeen1

Player: How about that bitcoin, amirite?
[TEEN1] Teen: Please don't.

Player: Would you do me a favor?
[TEEN2] Teen: Probably not. But go on.
Debra: I need you to wait until I go inside.
[TEEN3] Teen: Uh huh.
Debra: Then kick that car over there.
[TEEN4] Teen: ARE YOU CRAZY?!
Debra: Not so loud!
Debra: I just need to do a thing.
[TEEN5] Teen: I see, well then I just need motivation.
Debra: Motivation?
[TEEN6] Teen: Cash.
Debra: Oh.

Player: See ya.
[TEEN7] Teen: Probably not.
